type_header_font.label: Font
type_header_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Font
type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

settings.info: The settings below automatically add color swatches to the filter in collection and search page.

swatches_filter.info: To filter using additional color or image values, create metaobjects and metaobject references, then change the settings below as per your preferences. [Learn about showing visual filters using metaobjects.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters#visual-filters)

swatch_show_by_default.label: Swatches shown by default
swatch_show_by_default.info: Select 0 to show all available swatches on product cards.

products.name: Products
products.text_option_info: Fill in the name(s) of the option used as text swatch, phrases of different languages are separated by a comma (E.g. Size, Taille).
products.color_option_info: Fill in all the name(s) of the color option used in the store, phrases of different languages are separated by a comma. (E.g. Color, Colour, Couleur).
products.color_swatches_example: One 'color name:value' per line. Up to three colors can be used to show vertical stripes. E.g.: 'Red Blue Stripes:#e22#22e'
products.color_swatches_guide: To use an image for color swatch, [upload a PNG image](/admin/settings/files) with the file name matching the color name, and spaces replaced by hyphens. E.g. for 'Hot Pink', upload 'hot-pink.png'.
products.replace_color_with_variant_images: Replace color options with variant images

search_exclusion.label: Search exclusion
search_exclusion.info: Exclude collections from in-store search and automatic recommendations.

exclude_collections.label: Exclude collections whose names contain
exclude_collections.info: Fill in collection handles, separated by semicolon, to exclude from search and recommendations.

show_speech_search.label: Enable speech search
show_speech_search.info: Speech search is only available on Chrome for desktop or Android (will not work on iPhone).

search_navigation.name: Search and navigation

predictive_search_enabled.label: Enable product suggestions
predictive_search_enabled.info: Live search results. Not available in all languages.

search_navigation.full_width: Make breadcrumbs full width on desktop
search_navigation.full_width_mobile: Make breadcrumbs full width on mobile

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32 px

cart.name: Cart
cart.enable_featured_discount_note: In case a free shipping code is applied, the discounted shipping fee will be reflected only in checkout page.
cart.cart_upsell_note: If enabled in minicart and cart page, upsell recommendations can be shown following this priority (from high to low):
cart.cart_upsell_note_1: (1) by creating a product metafield in cart upsell and this field is not blank.[See our user guide for further details.](https://support.omnithemes.com/blogs/user-guide/custom-data-metafields#cart-upsell-metafield)
cart.cart_upsell_note_2: (2) by selecting a list of products manually in the settings below
cart.cart_upsell_note_3: (3) by using dynamic recommendations based on Shopify product recommendations.[Learn more.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)
cart.product_infor: If you use a product metafield to add upsell products, leave this field blank.

show_cart_custom_field.label: Enable Custom field
show_cart_custom_field.info: "Field label" must be filled in to enable custom field.

cart_custom_field_pattern.label: Validation regex (Advanced)
cart_custom_field_pattern.info: For field validation purpose. Please avoid using it if you’re not familiar with Regex. For assistance with Regex or fixing issues that arise from it, please [contact our support](https://omnithemes.com/contact/).

collection.label: Collection
collection.info: Visible when cart drawer is empty

order_amount_freeshipping.label: Order amount for freeshipping
order_amount_freeshipping.note: Enter the rules for order amount(s) to qualify for freeshipping (one rule per line). Format instructions and examples are as follow:
order_amount_freeshipping.example_1: amount (100) for orders from any country and currency without individually defined amount.
order_amount_freeshipping.example_2: currency code:amount (USD:100) for orders from any country using USD without individually defined amount.
order_amount_freeshipping.example_3: country code:currency code:amount (US:USD:100) for any orders from the US with the currency USD.

min_days.label: Minimum day(s) of delivery
min_days.info: The minimum number of days needed to ship all orders. Use a semicolon to differentiate between shipping markets if needed (e.g. US:6;GB:3), or fill in one number to apply for all available markets. Country codes should follow [ISO 3166 standard.](https://www.iban.com/country-codes)
min_days.note: To customize for each product, create a metafield with the key 'custom.delivery_date_min' and type 'Text'. [Learn more about creating metafields](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields/using-metafields) or [contact our support](https://omnithemes.com/contact/).

max_days.label: Maximum day(s) of delivery
max_days.info: The maximum number of days needed to ship all orders. Use a semicolon to differentiate between shipping markets if needed (e.g. US:6;GB:3), or fill in one number to apply for all available markets. Country codes should follow [ISO 3166 standard.](https://www.iban.com/country-codes)
max_days.note: To customize for each product, create a metafield with the key 'custom.delivery_date_max' and type 'Text'. [Learn more about creating metafields](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields/using-metafields) or [contact our support](https://omnithemes.com/contact/).

estimate_shipping.name: Estimated shipping rates
estimate_shipping.text: Display the estimated shipping cost at minicart and cart page based on customer's address.

show_estimate_cart.label: Show in cart
show_estimate_cart.info: Show estimated delivery time for the whole cart.

enable_estimate_shipping_cart.label: Show in cart items
enable_estimate_shipping_cart.info: Show estimated delivery time under each item in cart, checkout page and order details.

seo.name: SEO
seo.show_canonical_url_collection: Show original collection URL for canonical tags
seo.note: Show original URL for paginated collection pages as canonical tags.

header.info: Used to show in site's structured data and on Google's SERP graph card. Learn more about [organization schema](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/appearance/structured-data/organization).

business_address.info_1: Fill the address by order (all fields are optional): street address, address locality, address region, postal code, address country code. E.g: Rue Improbable 99,Paris,Ile-de-France,75001,FR
business_address.info_2: Provide multiple addresses if you have locations in multiple cities, states, or countries.

combined_listing.name: Combined Listings (Plus only)
combined_listing.info: Install the [Combined Listing](https://apps.shopify.com/combined-listings) app and enable this setting to use this feature. Available on Plus and enterprise commerce plans only.

reorder.name: Reorder
reorder.info: Show Reorder button from customer account and customer order pages

advanced.name: Advanced

product_reviews_app.label: Product reviews app
product_reviews_app.info: Select the review app to integrate with theme's native product rating. Some app in 'Other' option might not fully compatible with the theme, please [contact us for support](https://omnithemes.com/contact/).

advanced.custom_info: For support with handling custom code or fixing issues related to custom code, please [contact us](https://omnithemes.com/contact/).

additional_head.label: HTML for <head> tag
additional_head.info: Used for any custom HTML code to apply site-wide. Placed at the bottom of the <head> tag on all theme pages, except for checkout page.

selected_preset.label: Selected preset
selected_preset.info: This automatically detects your theme style and keeps necessary data when switching between presets. DO NOT EDIT, or it might result in losing theme settings and media.

lang_direction.label: RTL languages
lang_direction.info: Input the language codes to show languages in RTL layout. All codes must follow [ISO Language Code Table](https://www.w3schools.com/tags/ref_language_codes.asp) and separated using commas (Ex: ar,fa,ps)

enable_rounded_corners.label: Enable rounded corner style
enable_rounded_corners.info: To change button style, go to Theme settings > Buttons. To change image style for some specific sections, go to the section settings and search for 'Enable rounded corner images'.

currency_format.name: Currency format
currency_format.info: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

animation.name: Animations
animation.disable_parallax_effect_info: Parallax effect used in: Slideshow, Promotion banner, Media with text, Collection banner, Map, Age Verification popup.
animation.disable_zoom_info: Image zoom-in animation used in: Product card images, Collection card images, Media gallery, Promotion grid, Promotion popup, Text columns with image.

paragraph.content: Ask your customers for consent to use cookies and process their data, as required by the European Union's ePrivacy Directive and General Data Protection Regulation. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/your-account/privacy/GDPR)

text_settings.label: Add a cookie banner to your store in Theme settings > Cookie banner

enable_product_compare.label: Enable Product compare
enable_product_compare.info: Enable 'Add to compare' buttons on product cards, Featured product sections and the Product page, allowing product fields and metafields to be compared in one same comparison grid.

text_to_use_for_empty_fields.label: Text to use for empty fields

padding_full_width.label: Enable side padding
padding_full_width.info: Add left and right padding when section is full-width.

open_new_window.label: Open this link in a new window

icon.info_button_icon: Applies to 'Sliced with icon' animation type.
icon.custom_icon_info: For assistance with custom SVG code or fixing issues that arise from custom SVG code, please [contact our support](https://omnithemes.com/contact/).
icon.label: Icon

image.label: Image
image.note_image_size: For recommended image sizes, check our [user guide](https://support.omnithemes.com/blogs/user-guide/faqs).

text.heading: Heading
text.title: Title
text.show_headng_as_h1_info: A page should only have one h1 tag for SEO purposes.

number_of_lines_shown.label: Default content height
number_of_lines_shown.info: Decide the height of content block shown before clicking "Read more".

menu.label: Menu
menu.info: To show 4-level menu, leave this field blank
Choose a menu to apply for this menu item. Learn how to create a 4-level menu [here.](https://support.omnithemes.com/blogs/user-guide-header-1/user-guide-group-section-header-section-mega-menu)
menu.label: Menu

enable_carousel_on_desktop.label: Enable carousel on desktop
enable_carousel_on_desktop.info: Slider is the default mobile layout.

only_show_first_level_menu.label: Only show the first level of the selected menu.

change_bar_every.label: Change bar every
change_bar_every.info: Make sure Auto-switch bar is on.

schedule_start_time.content: Set up exact time to start the countdown on the announcement bar.

schedule_end_time.content: Set up exact time to stop the countdown on the announcement bar.

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

image_padding.label: Use original image ratio
image_padding.info: Select if you don't want your image to be cropped.

header_video_url.label: Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected.

description.label: Video alt text
description.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

related_collections.name: Related collections
related_collections.info: Create a collection metafield with the key "related_collections" and type Collection (List of collections). Go to each collection page in admin and select the collections in the metafield to show in this section. If no metafield data is found, the theme detects the related collections automatically based on the collections of the product in current collection.

email.name: Email
email.info: Email is always required to submit the form.

options.label: Options
options.info: Input values of dropdowns, radio buttons and checkboxes. Options are separated by a simicolon (Ex: Client;Partner;Retailer;Wholesaler)

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

image_alignment.label: Desktop image alignment
image_alignment.info: Image is always on top on mobile.

block_author_note.label: Additional text
block_author_note.info: Used to show reviewer's address, order or product link.

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

columns_first_row.label: Number of columns on first row

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews)

image_ratio.info: Do not apply to overlay text style.

show_promotion.label: Enable title card
show_promotion.info: Card prioritizes showing the featured product, followed by video and then image.

enable_quickview.label: Show Quick view button
enable_quickview.info: View product details in a popup without leaving the current page.

enable_atc.label: Show Quick add button
enable_atc.info: Add to cart right from product cards without opening quick view popup or going to the product page.

label_quickview.label: Quick view button label
label_quickview.info: "Quick view" will be used as default

settings.paragraph__1: Show more details about the product's vendor following this priority (from high to low):
settings.paragraph__2: (1) by linking the vendor name to the collection of corresponding vendor. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/docs/api/liquid/filters#link_to_vendor)
settings.paragraph__3: (2) by selecting a page to show page's content in a popup without leaving the current site. If enabling metafield to show vendor collection in admin, the link will be automatically applied here.
settings.paragraph__4: (3) by filling in a URL to direct to an external link.

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

pickup_availability.label: Enable pickup availability feature
pickup_availability.info: Learn how to setup this feature [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/local-methods/local-pickup)

options__3.label: When product is out of stock

preorder_show.label: Enable
preorder_show.info: If 'When product is out of stock' option is selected, please make sure 'Continue selling when out of stock' is enabled in Shopify admin > Product detail page.

preorder_message.label: Message
preorder_message.info: Message will show under Pre-order button to provide more information about the item.

preorder_show_dynamic_button.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons for pre-orders

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products

estimate_delivery.name: Estimated delivery time
estimate_delivery.paragraph: To customize message for each product, create a metafield with the key 'custom.delivery_date_message ' and type 'Rich text'. [Learn more about creating metafields.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields/using-metafields)

message.label: Message
message.info__1: You can use these codes in the message:
message.info__2: earliest_delivery_date to show earliest delivery date.
message.info__3: latest_delivery_date to show latest delivery date.

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images)

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store)

paragraph.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews)
Store owner will receive an email when customer fills in this form.

show_when_product_unavailable.label: Only show when product is unavailable
show_when_product_unavailable.info: Email alert will NOT be automatically sent to the customer. You will need to do this manually.

customize_picker.name: Customizable options
customize_picker.info: Customizable options are added options to allow products to have more than 3 options in default Shopify. These customizable options are not tracked in product inventory, and will NOT make any change to product prices.

option_name.label: Option name
option_name.info: The option name must be unique.

header_1.label: Text options
header_1.info: Only applies to options in Text type: Text field and Text editor

min_text_length.label: Minimum character length
min_text_length.info: Input the minimum number of characters needed in the field. Only applicable if the option is required. Leave blank if no minimum length should be applied.

max_text_length.label: Maximum character length
max_text_length.info: Input the maximum number of characters needed in the field. Only applicable if the option is required. Leave blank if no maximum length should be applied.

option_text_note.label: Option note
option_text_note.info: Add a note or explanation for this option.

header_2.label: Select options
header_2.info: Only applies to options in Select type: Checkbox, Dropdown and Radio button

option_list.label: Option values
option_list.info: Input values for Select type options. Values are separated by a simicolon (Ex: Polo;V-Neck;Boat Neck)

option_select_note.label: Option note
option_select_note.info: Add a note or explanation for this option.

minimum_select_value.label: Minimum values required
minimum_select_value.info: Input the minimum number of values required to be selected. Only applicable for Checkbox, when the option is required. Leave blank if no limit should be applied.

maximum_select_value.label: Maximum values allowed
maximum_select_value.info: Input the maximum number of values could to be selected. Only applicable for Checkbox, when the option is required. Leave blank if no limit should be applied.

header_3.label: File upload
header_3.info: Only applies to options of File upload

option_file_note.label: Option note
option_file_note.info: Add a note or explanation for this option.

header_4.label: Swatches
header_4.info: Only applies to options in Swatches type: Text swatch and Color swatch.

swatch_value.label: Swatch values
swatch_value.info: Input values for text swatch or color swatch options. Each value is on one line. For color swatch, input in 'option name:color code' format. (Ex: White:#FFFFFF)

swatch_style.label: Swatch style
swatch_style.info: Only applies to color swatch and color picker options.

header_5.label: Date & Time
header_5.info: Only applies to options in Date & Time type: Date, Time

details.label: Details
details.info: Use a colon to separate two columns in a table. Use a hyphen to indent rows. Add a new row with line breaks (using SHIFT + ENTER). Learn more

show_media_with_variant_selected.label: Only show media associated with the selected variant

option_to_classify_variant_media.label: Option to classify variant media
option_to_classify_variant_media.info: Fill in the option name used to classify each variant's media. Use semicolons to separate the option labels in different languages (e.g. Color;Colour;Couleur).

show_thumbnails.label: Show product media thumbnails
show_thumbnails.info: Only applies in case of multiple product images.

enable_video_autoplay.label: Enable video autoplay
enable_video_autoplay.info: Video will be muted when autoplay is on.

hide_other_variant.label: Hide other variants' media after selecting a variant

show_tax_and_shipping.label: Show tax status and shipping policy

hide_variants.label: Hide unselected variants’ media on desktop

show_first_image_avaiable.label: Show variant images on page load

header__1.info: Subscribers added automatically to your “accepted marketing” customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers/manage-customers)

header__2.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

header__4.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

header__6.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

paragraph.content: Each email subscription creates a customer account.

show_social_icons.label: Show social icons
show_social_icons.info: Show social icons within the block. To show social icons footer-wide, enable social icons in section setting.

header_follow_on_shop.info: Display follow button for your storefront on the Shop app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

settings.info: Choose a menu to apply for this menu item. Learn how to create a 4-level menu [here.](https://support.omnithemes.com/blogs/user-guide-header-1/user-guide-group-section-header-section-mega-menu)

show_first_image_product.label: Auto-fill collection images with first product image

collection_metafield.label: Auto-fill collection images with metafield
collection_metafield.info: This applies to all items in menu. Use metafield to have better ratio and quality. Learn more
collection_metafield.info_list: Use metafield to have better ratio and quality. Learn more

settings.info: Choose a menu to apply for this menu item. Learn how to create a 4-level menu [here.](https://support.omnithemes.com/blogs/user-guide-header-1/user-guide-group-section-header-section-mega-menu)
Simple mega menu only shows up to 3 levels. In Online Store > Navigation, try creating menu with 2 levels only.

logo_position.label: Desktop header layout
logo_position.info: Text direction is left-to-right by default. For right-to-left languages, the direction is reversed.

menu.label: Menu
menu.info: To show 4-level menu, leave this field blank

menu_type_desktop.label: Desktop menu type
menu_type_desktop.info: Menu type is automatically optimized for mobile.

sticky_header_type.label: Sticky header
sticky_header_type.info: Keep header sticky on top of the page as customers scroll down.

show_hero.label: Used as Hero
show_hero.info: Enable if this section is used as hero, disable if not.

desktop_height.label: Desktop height
desktop_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

button_label.label: First button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

button_label_2.label: Second button label
button_label_2.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

countdown.name: Countdown timer
countdown.content: Add a countdown timer to instill a sense of urgency among your customers and encourages them to buy a product.

desktop_image_width.label: Desktop image width
desktop_image_width.info: Image is automatically optimized for mobile.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

image_height.label: Featured image height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

full_width_banner.label: Make banner full width on desktop

full_width_banner_mobile.label: Make banner full width on mobile

post_per_page.label: Post per page
post_per_page.info: Add options for customers to choose the maximum number of posts shown on one page. Only intergers larger than 0 are counted as valid, and options must be separated by a semicolon (e.g. 5;10;20;30).

note_per_page.info: Note: Options larger than 20 items per page is not recommended for performance optimization purpose.

paragraph.content: Change excerpts by editing your blog posts. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/blogs/writing-blogs#display-an-excerpt-from-a-blog-post)

image_height.label: Featured image height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

settings.info: When cart page layout is Above, add Subtotal and Checkout button blocks to show the Order summary informations.
When cart page layout is Side, add Subtotal and Checkout button blocks to show the Order summary informations.

full_width_title.label: Make collection title full width on desktop

paragraph.content: Add a description or image by editing your collection. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections/collection-layout)

show_collection_image.label: Show collection image
show_collection_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

products_per_page.label: Products per page
products_per_page.info: Add options for customers to choose the maximum number of products shown on one page. Only intergers larger than 0 are counted as valid, and options must be separated by a semicolon (e.g. 5;10;20;30).

per_page_note.info: Note: Options larger than 30 items per page is not recommended for performance optimization purpose.

filter_type.label: Desktop filter layout
filter_type.info: Drawer is the default mobile layout.

expand_filter.label: Expand all filters by default
expand_filter.info: Only applies to Drawer and Aside filter type.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews)

enable_quick_buy.label: Enable quick add button
enable_quick_buy.info: Optimal with popup or drawer cart type.

key_value.label: Advanced filter labels
key_value.info: Fill in the labels of the option to show as advanced filter (e.g. Color). One label per row, maximum of TWO labels. The filter whose label is input first will be shown on top, followed by the second filter.

number_of_columns.label: Number of items in first row

number_of_columns_2.label: Number of items in second row
number_of_columns_2.info: Select the number of filter values shown per row in advanced filters.

sort.label: Sort collections by:
sort.info: Only applied when all collections are shown.

image_ratio.label: Image style
image_ratio.info: Add images by editing your collections. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections)

settings.description: Avoid using H1 tag for page heading as it may affect SEO ranking.

show_heading.label: Show the default page heading
show_heading.info: If hidden, you should provide a h1 heading using the section heading for SEO purposes.

text.label: Label
text.info: Use collection_name to show the collection name in the label.

product_sibling.name: Sibling products
product_sibling.info: Link siblings with similar characteristics via a linking option.

settings.option_info: Name of the option that links the siblings (e.g. Color).

collection_handle_metafield.label: Collection handle metafield
collection_handle_metafield.info: Create a collection containing the option values as unique products. Create a product metafield to fill in that collection handle for each set of sibling products. Fill in the key of that metafield here (e.g. custom.sibling-collection)

option_value_metafield.label: Option value metafield
option_value_metafield.info: Create a product metafield to fill in the option value of each sibling product. Fill in the key of that metafield here (e.g. custom.sibling-color)

number_product_per_page.label: Number of products per page
number_product_per_page.info: Only applies when carousel is enabled.

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Let customers check out directly using a familiar payment method. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

pickup_availability.label: Enable pickup availability
pickup_availability.info: Learn how to setup this feature [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/local-methods/local-pickup)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

paragraph.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews)

text.default: Your transaction is protected with advanced security measures to keep your information confidential
text.label: Text

desktop_media_layout.label: Desktop media layout
desktop_media_layout.info: Mobile media layout is automatically adjusted to fit the screen.

hide_variants.label: Hide other variants’ media after selecting a variant

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews)

change_bar_every.label: Change bar every
change_bar_every.info: Make sure Auto-switch logo is on.

columns_desktop.label: Number of columns
columns_desktop.info: If left 0, the number of columns on each row is automatically adjusted based on the original width of the logo images.

columns_mobile.label: Number of columns
columns_mobile.info: If Auto is selected, the number of columns on each row is automatically adjusted based on the original width of the logo images.

image_ratio.info: Not applicaple when Number of columns equals 0.

paragraph.content: Each email subscription creates a customer account.
Each email subscription creates a customer account.

paragraph__1.content: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/themes/development/recommended-products)

show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews)

desktop_content_position.label: Desktop content position
desktop_content_position.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile.

button_label_1.label: First button label
button_label_1.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

button_label_2.label: Second button label
button_label_2.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

show_sound_control.info: Applies to auto play videos only.

header_video_url.label: Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected.

video_url.label: URL
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

description.label: Video alt text
description.info: Describe the video for customers using screen readers. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video)

header_video_url.label: Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected.

video_url.label: URL
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

show_hero.label: Used as Hero
show_hero.info: Enable if this section is used as hero, disable if not.

store_address.label: Store address
store_address.info: Google Map will find the exact location

image.label: Image
image.info: Use when store address is left blank.

settings.introduce: Use this section to add labels and badges to your products and product cards. [See tutorials](https://support.omnithemes.com/blogs/overlay-group-1/user-guide-product-labels-badges)

sale-label.name: Sale label
sale-label.introduce: Sale label automatically displays on all discounted products.

content.info: use {sale} for discount percentage, {sale_amount} for discount amount.

sold-out-label.name: Sold out label
sold-out-label.introduce: Sold out label automatically displays on all unavailable products.

content.info: Use {inventory} for "In stock/Sold out", {quantity} for total quantity in inventory.

show_on_product_page.label: Show on product page
show_on_product_page.info: To show labels and badges in Quick view and Product Information, please add the 'Labels and badges' block in those sections, or check [this guide.](https://support.omnithemes.com/blogs/overlay-group-1/user-guide-product-labels-badges)

icon.label: Icon
icon.info: Icon will show in front of label text.

content.label: Content
content.info__1: You can use these codes in the content:
content.info__5: {count_down} for count down timer to end date. (Must enable schedule)

applied_collections.label: Apply to collections
applied_collections.info: Select collections to show this Featured icon block.

schedule_introduce.content: Set up to show labels on start time and hide on end time.

schedule_start_time.content: Set up exact time to start showing labels and badges.

schedule_end_time.content: Set up exact time to stop showing labels and badges.

info.label: To make editing easier, only the selecting popup is shown in Theme editor.

show_on_mobile.label: Show on mobile
show_on_mobile.info: For better website accessibility, we recommend that only one popup should be shown on mobile devices.

delay.label: Delay
delay.info: Delay is disabled in theme editor for editing purposes.

reappear-after.label: Reappear after
reappear-after.info: The number of days before a dismissed popup reappears.

schedule_enabled.label: Enable schedule
schedule_enabled.info: Set up start and end date in the 'Countdown timer' block to show popup on schedule.

minimal_popup.note: Show a small sticky message for the popup at the screen bottom. Clicking this message will open the full popup as configured.
minimal_popup.title: Title
minimal_popup.subtitle: Subtitle

schedule_start_time.content: Setup the exact time to start countdown timer and show the popup on the storefront.

schedule_end_time.content: Setup the exact time to end countdown timer and hide the popup on the storefront.

text.label: Text
text.info: Use coupon_code to show the coupon code within the text box.

enable.label: Enable
enable.info: Popup will automatically be displayed in theme editor.

reappear-after.label: Reappear after
reappear-after.info: The number of days before a dismissed popup reappears.

media_position.label: Media position
media_position.info: Does not apply for overlay content.

enable_video_autoplay.label: Enable video autoplay
enable_video_autoplay.info: Video will be muted when autoplay is on.

enable_video_autoplay.label: Enable video autoplay
enable_video_autoplay.info: Video will be muted when autoplay is on.

ticket_link.label: Ticket page link
ticket_link.info: Add a ticket page to sell tickets to attendees. Create a [digital product](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/digital-service-product/selling-services-or-digital-products) to provide more information about the event, and optionally hide it from product listings. [Contact us](https://omnithemes.com/contact/) for free support to exclude products from internal search and product recommendations.

show_end_date.label: This event has an end date

select_products.label: Select products
select_products.info: Products selected here will override the collection selected above (if exist). Select up to 12 products.

discount_type.label: Discount type
discount_type.info: Select the discount type of your preferred discount rule in Admin > Discounts to show the discount price in bundle details.

discount_value.label: Discount value
discount_value.info: Fill in the exact discount percentage or amount of your preferred discount rule in Admin > Discounts. If the value here is different from discount values with selected type in all existing discount rules on the store, the correct discount value cannot be shown in bundle details, but can still be applied in cart and checkout, which might cause customers' confusion.

each_product_can_added_to_bundle_once.label: Each product can be added to bundle once
each_product_can_added_to_bundle_once.info: If products have variants, each variants can only be added once.

minimum_items.label: Minimum items in bundle to get discounts

apply_discount_once_per_order.label: Only apply discount once per order
apply_discount_once_per_order.info: Setup the same as the "Only apply discount once per order" setting in the preferred discount rule in admin. If disabled, discount amount will be taken off each eligible item in an order.

open_first_tab.label: Open the first tab by default

desktop_height.label: Desktop height
desktop_height.info: Does not apply with video media type.

mobile_height.label: Mobile height
mobile_height.info: Does not apply with video media type.

button_text.label: Button text
button_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

button_text.label: Button text
button_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

button_text.label: Button text
button_text.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

enable_video_autoplay.label: Enable video autoplay
enable_video_autoplay.info: Video will be muted when autoplay is on.

button_info.info: Button directs to the selected collection page by default.

criteria_option.label: Criteria option
criteria_option.info: Fill in all the name(s) of the option used in the store, phrases of different languages are separated by a comma. (E.g. Color, Colour, Couleur). Fill in the name of one product option. Each value of this option will be a column in the attribute table.

settings.note: Metafield values can also be used as criteria.
settings.note_1: 1. Create a metaobject with the key "product_specs_list", containing one field with the exact name "specs" (Single line text/One value).
settings.note_2: 2. Create entries for the metaobject (e.g. "Dry Skin", "UV Protection").
settings.note_3: 3. Create a product metafield with the key "product_specs" (Metaobject/List of values) and select the just-created metaobject.
settings.note_4: 4. Assign values for each product via metafield in admin product detail page.
settings.note_5: 5. Fill in the key "product_specs" of the respective metafield in this field.
settings.note_6: For more details, please [contact us for free support.](https://omnithemes.com/contact/)

list_option_show.label: List of option shown
list_option_show.info: Only apply for metaobject as criteria option. List the entries of the metaobject to show as criteria in the table. Leave blank to show all created entries of the metaobject "product_specs_list"

apply_button_label.label: Apply button label
apply_button_label.info: Add label to apply the coupon code automatically in cart.

promo_code_note.content: The start and end date below should align with the start and end date of the Discount rule in Shopify admin > Discounts. Learn more about [discount code.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/discounts/discount-types#discount-codes)

introduce.label: This section lets you control what and in which order information is shown for each product within the compare popup. To preview the compare popup, add products to compare on a Collection Page or Search Results Page.

option_name.label: Option name
option_name.infor: This should be the name of the variant option.

text_empty_fields.label: Text to use for empty fields

description.name: Product description
description.content: Only works if added in product pages.
